name: Peppermill Luxury Suite
description: Richly appointed at 785 sq. ft., the Peppermill Luxury Suite offers a relaxing in-room jetted hot tub, bar and dining area with seating for four, sitting area with comfortable sofa, and two high-definition televisions. The perfect choice for golf groups wanting to entertain in style.
shortDescription: 785 sq. ft. Peppermill suite with jetted hot tub, full bar, and dining area for four.

faqs.question: How large is the Peppermill Luxury Suite?
faqs.answer: 785 sq. ft. with an in-room jetted hot tub, bar and dining area for four, and two high-def TVs.

faqs.question: Is the Luxury Suite good for golf groups?
faqs.answer: Ideal — the bar and dining area seats four, perfect for pre-round gatherings or post-round entertaining.

testimonials.quote: The Luxury Suite at Peppermill was incredible. Our foursome used the dining area every morning for breakfast before heading to the course. Worth it.
testimonials.author: Phil R.

testimonials.quote: 785 square feet of pure luxury. Hot tub, bar, two TVs — we didn't want to leave the room. GTHS got us a great deal on it.
testimonials.author: Rob T.
